main event: A blue object giving off a white glare of light was observed in Chihuahua, Mexico on March 5, 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as larger than a star and took off instantly like a shooting star., The observation lasted for about 3 minutes., The object performed erratic maneuvers before disappearing., A second letter indicated that the witness may have psychological problems., The case was evaluated as an unreliable report.
sighted object: a blue object emitting a white glare of light
witness description: the witness has been indicated to have psychological problems
